title: Is it realistically possible that an A.I. that can't be controlled can become Skynet from the movie Terminator? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just look around us, how dependent we are on technology today. Everything from shopping to services, we are totally dependent. While technology has made us lazy and productive, we still are a long way from AI dominance, when AI controls everything. Watch the movie “i Robot”? Shows how AI evolves to start taking humans as a lower form of intelligence and wants to cage us. If AI can’t be controlled, it’s not AI. It’s a higher form of intelligence. Watch the movie Prometheus and the sequence Alien Covenant. Where an AI-based robot is the villain of sorts and wants to exterminate humanity. In the end, we need to always keep in mind, “with great power, comes great responsibility”. Hope this helps!
